Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Activity
    Activitys are performed by Players during their own turn.
    Execution
    An Execution is an ordered list of Activitys the Player can perform during their turn.
    Grab
    The Grab Activity is used to collect AmmoCubes from an AmmoCell or buy a Weapon from a SpawnCell's Weapon shop.
    Move
    The Move Activity is used to change a Player's position to a new position, so long as the distance between the two does not exceed a fixed limit.
    Player
    The Player is the main actor of the Game.
    Reload
    The Reload Activity allows a Player to reload as many Weapons as they can afford to.
    ScoreList
    This class determines the amount of points a Player hands out to his opponents from whom they took Damage.
    Shoot
    The Shoot Activity allows a Player to use a loaded Weapon in their possession to Damage, Mark and/or Move one or more of their opponents.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ActivityType
    An enumeration containing the four possible Activity types.
